name: Demon's Day Out
description:
This is my 8th game I made from Game Gen and it's an inspiration of Super Mario Bros. that is a Halloween theme game where the character name is Jerry a demon that you play as and have to go through the game that some levels are unfair and hard to play through.

The controls are simple

Left Arrow - Move  Left Right Arrow - Move Right  Up Arrow - Jump/Glide while holding  Spacebar - Shoot Fireballs (Fireball Powerup)

That's all about with the game I made I hope you can make it through to the final level of the game and by the way there are only 7 levels of the game so don't expect much that will all hope the game is challenging to beat.
